segments.text: I'd like to make an appointment with Dr.Cooper.Could you arrange it for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes.Would tomorrow morning be all right with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , I've got a meeting from nine to ten.What about Monday afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid he's fully engaged.Could you make it another time ?
segments.speaker: S2
